name: Monster Chase (Sabhari Shrinivas)
description:
Thank you for checking this game out, means the world to me. If you did play, be sure to drop a comment. Would love to hear feedback from you and improvise the game.

`````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````

Find the source code to this game here:

Monster Chase - GitHub

`````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````

How to play:

Dodge the monsters by jumping over them and aim for an high score.

select a character to begin the game (my fav is the black one whom I named bald dood)

A key -> move left

D key -> move right

space bar -> jump

Escape key -> Quit game

```````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````
